Learning from USDS Engineering Director David Holmes 💪🏽🖥️🇺🇸

Jun 26, 2019

  • civictech
  • episode
  • usds
  • engineering
  • software

We are joined by David Holmes, Director of Engineering over at the United States Digital Service. Our conversation will cover a number of topics including technology accessibility, interacting with partners and translating business rules into code, and the mentorship and development of engineers.
